item.title: MIUI 21.4.22 Recovery update for Redmi Note 8 China
item.description:
New Weekly Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Note 8 China

Codename: ginkgo

Version: 21.4.22 | 11.0

Size: 2.8 GB

MD5: 560a6be1d4f8fa7a87b272576f9ffdba

Bug fixes and system optimizations.

item.title: MIUI V12.0.3.0.QCOCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 8 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 8 China

Codename: ginkgo

Version: V12.0.3.0.QCOCNXM | 10.0

Size: 3.4 GB

MD5: fe1f2115e7a611cb4c8e9229fc16e1fd

Changelog:
[Control center]
Optimization: Control center layout in landscape mode
[System]
Fix: Noise could be heard when the screen was turned off in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to November 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here
